title: It's way too common to see the bandwagon on the boards
body:
Posts just venting out over a champion when the OP has fed/legitimately built incorrectly against them. The points offer no form of actual discussion rather than salt or targets the incorrect parts of a champion or confuses the role benefits with the champion itself.

It's quite disappointing in Gameplay.

replies.body:
Feel free to pitch some changes that you think would help with this problem; we have some active discussions going on on [Discuss the Boards](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation) to talk about what we could do to help promote active discussions.

I definitely agree with you that we could be having much more useful discussions on Gameplay.

If you see enough threads about "insert champion here" make a megathread and post rules saying all further threads about said champion will be deleted and all discussion can take place in the megathread.



Considering 80% of threads are just bandwagon threads so they can have attention on the boards.

> [{quoted}](name=Elohaven,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=4g3uu3i9,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-01-24T23:54:51.300+0000)
>
> Posts just venting out over a champion when the OP has fed/legitimately built incorrectly against them. The points offer no form of actual discussion rather than salt or targets the incorrect parts of a champion or confuses the role benefits with the champion itself.
> 
> It&#039;s quite disappointing in Gameplay.

And posts like yours are extremely common too. What about you deleting this pointless thread? Thank you.

The ratio in terms of these category of posts towards the ones described is very small. They're not common. I would use this thread as a platform for more discussion but I'm moving my ideas to **Discuss the Boards**. I believe if you're not willing to contribute or provide a counterargument - it's simply best not to comment as your post is purely negative.
